byline.original: By THE NEW YORK TIMES DEVELOPERS

abstract: The Grace Hopper Celebration bills itself as the world’s largest gathering of women in computing. It is rare to see so many women technologists all at once, and our first experience attending made us reflective in a way that felt important to share.

headline.main: We Went to the Grace Hopper Celebration. Here’s What We’re Bringing Back
